data.title: Lloyd Kaufman
data.meta_description: Lloyd Kaufman, co-founder of 41-year-old Troma Entertainment, directed many of their feature films, including The Toxic Avenger, The Class of Nuke ‘Em High, Sgt. Kabukiman NYPD, Tromeo & Juliet and Poultrygeist: Night of the Chicken Dead. Kaufman has written six books and has presented his “Make Your Own Damn Movie” masterclasses around the world. His latest film, Return to Nuke ‘Em High […]
data.text:
Talkhouse Film Contributors Remember George A. Romero

Talkhouse Film Contributors Remember George A. Romero

Lloyd Kaufman, Darren Lynn Bousman, Larry Fessenden, Rodney Ascher, Emily Hagins and more remember the much-loved father of the zombie movie.

Bill Plympton Talks with Lloyd Kaufman for The Talkhouse Film Podcast

Bill Plympton Talks with Lloyd Kaufman for The Talkhouse Film Podcast

The two friends and founding fathers of the New York independent film scene sit down for a chat at Samsung 837 in New York City.

Lloyd Kaufman and Bill Plympton Are Recording a Live Talkhouse Podcast in New York

Lloyd Kaufman and Bill Plympton Are Recording a Live Talkhouse Podcast in New York

Join us at Samsung 837 in New York City on July 7 for a conversation between two legendary filmmakers.

Lloyd Kaufman (The Toxic Avenger) Talks Ondi Timoner’s Brand: A Second Coming

Lloyd Kaufman (The Toxic Avenger) Talks Ondi Timoner’s Brand: A Second Coming

This doc portrait of a revolutionary, messianic narcissist takes on added resonance if viewed during and juxtaposed with the Pope's recent U.S. visit.

Lloyd Kaufman (The Toxic Avenger) Talks Takashi Murakami’s Jellyfish Eyes

Lloyd Kaufman (The Toxic Avenger) Talks Takashi Murakami’s Jellyfish Eyes

Uncle Lloydie tries to get his bearings in the bizarro world of a Japanese kids movie (that maybe isn't actually for kids).

Filmmakers Rodney Ascher and Lloyd Kaufman Talk Cannes Film Festival Stories

Filmmakers Rodney Ascher and Lloyd Kaufman Talk Cannes Film Festival Stories

As the French Riviera's great festival finishes, our final two Cannes alumni recall their experiences braving the craziness of the Croisette.

Lloyd Kaufman (The Toxic Avenger) Talks Toa Fraser’s The Dead Lands

Lloyd Kaufman (The Toxic Avenger) Talks Toa Fraser’s The Dead Lands

The cult filmmaker finds much to like in an adventure that offers classical storytelling, high production values and, um, actual shit-eating.

Lloyd Kaufman (The Toxic Avenger) Talks Riley Stearns’ Faults

Lloyd Kaufman (The Toxic Avenger) Talks Riley Stearns’ Faults

The veteran cult filmmaker turns his attention to a new indie release, fittingly about a man who deprograms cult members.

Lloyd Kaufman (The Toxic Avenger) Talks Tommy Wirkola’s Dead Snow 2: Red vs. Dead

Lloyd Kaufman (The Toxic Avenger) Talks Tommy Wirkola’s Dead Snow 2: Red vs. Dead

One of the film's actors refused to share a sauna with him, but Troma's head honcho still thinks this Nazi zombie sequel is all kinds of awesome.
